Year Three

Student Portfolio Sites

Through the coursework students are encouraged to develop a live portfolio which is critiqued at a 'portfolio show' with professional developers and employers. Students are then asked to develop two independent projects, working on a technologies they wish to learn and develop as part of their skill set.

All student web sites are sponsored and hosted by our friends at 34sp.com
